extendedInfo.description: The is a VERY simple sound recorder. It records 22 kHz WAV files the "Sound Recordings" folder on your SD card.The UI is simple. Don't knock it.Recording continues even if app is closed. NB: 1 minute of audio takes 2.5 MB of space.If you want more features, donate some money to tdhutt@gmail.com. :-)

reviews.comment: Works well. Sound quality is good. You\'re gonna need an app that can browse your sd card to access your recordings. Please add a playback button
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Keep this app only if you want the highest quality and the cleanest sound from your phone, I was amazed. Tried 3 other apps, this is best by far
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: W
reviews.comment: The first three sound recorders I downloaded didn\'t record correctly, this one does so I have no hesitation recommending it and the simple interface makes it better
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Oh. My. Gosh. There is, like, NO white noise when i listen to my recordings. Like, it is almost studio quality. It does take up a bit of space tho...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: do not download this app
reviews.comment: when I hit record it records my audio and then I go and find the file and it will not play. I put it on my pc and it told me that it was corrupt. after that I tried to use my voice to text and it will not let me use my voice to text until I uninstall the app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Dunno what some of you ppl expect, you install an app called sound recorder and it does exactly that, then you rate it down as stupid?!? *poor devs*
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Interesting.. people who understand this App rate it five stars. Low ratings only by people who don\'t understand why simple is great in this case.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works like a charm. An awesome addition to this app would be a widget that instantly records then stops when pressed again.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great simple app
reviews.comment: Works how it should
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app; just what I wanted. Fyi I use astro file manager to browse the file system to playback the .wav recording files.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: A little too simple, BUT THE QUALITY!!!!!
reviews.comment: As the title suggested, too simple for my taste, but the quality of audio is so insanely amazing that it is worth the very minor inconvenience. I had no idea my phone had the potential to record such high quality audio.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Just what I was looking for. Free high quality recording software. Why are most others such poor quality?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Only recorded like 10 seconds - not even... \"simple\" - no. Simple looking yes. Awful :( I just want to record covers. Not sounds itself.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I\'m using \"voice recorder\" for notes, keeping this around in case i need to rec something hd. Simple hd record, no playback
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great on my own maded miui
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love this app. Only thing missing is a locale plugin for scheduled recordings or so. Otherwise it does the job in a simple but good way. N1 2.2.1
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: boring but it did what I needed it to do lol
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Best superior!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Simple works great
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Sux u record it once cant hear it or save it >:P
reviews.author: A Google User
